Package com.xm.cryptorecservice.persistence

Class DatabaseConnectionImpl

java.lang.Object
com.xm.cryptorecservice.persistence.DatabaseConnectionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseConnection
@Repository public class DatabaseConnectionImpl extends Object implements DatabaseConnection
An implementation of DatabaseConnection that performs batch inserts for DatabaseConnection.insertAllCryptoPrices(String, List).

    • insertAllCryptoPrices

      public void insertAllCryptoPrices(@NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String tableName, @NonNull @NonNull List<CryptoPrice> cryptoPrices)
      Description copied from interface: DatabaseConnection
      Insert all provided crypto prices into the table specified by tableName. Implementations are free to do this in batch mode or not.
      Specified by:
      insertAllCryptoPrices in interface DatabaseConnection
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to insert prices to.
      cryptoPrices - A List of CryptoPrice instances, every one of which needs to be persisted as a row in the table.

    • getCryptoPriceById

      public Optional<CryptoPrice> getCryptoPriceById(@NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String cryptoName, @NonNull @NonNull Long id)
      Description copied from interface: DatabaseConnection
      Attempt to retrieve a specific CryptoPrice entry by its unique ID.
      Specified by:
      getCryptoPriceById in interface DatabaseConnection
      Parameters:
      cryptoName - The name of the crypto (and table) whose ID we are querying.
      id - The unique ID of the < price, timestamp > we want to return.
      Returns:
      An Optional which will contain an instance of CryptoPrice if the database lookup returned a row, or Optional.empty() otherwise.

    • getCryptoPriceStats

      public Optional<CryptoPriceStats> getCryptoPriceStats(@NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String cryptoName)
      Description copied from interface: DatabaseConnection
      Attempt to retrieve the minimum, maximum, first and last crypto price for the provided crypto.
      Specified by:
      getCryptoPriceStats in interface DatabaseConnection
      Parameters:
      cryptoName - The name of the crypto (and corresponding table).
      Returns:
      An Optional which will contain an instance of CryptoPriceStats with the aforementioned stats if the database lookup was able to retrieve them, or Optional.empty() otherwise.

    • getCryptoPricesForDate

      public List<CryptoPrice> getCryptoPricesForDate(@NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String cryptoName, @NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String date)
      Description copied from interface: DatabaseConnection
      Get the < timestamp, price > tuples for the provided crypto and corresponding date.
      Specified by:
      getCryptoPricesForDate in interface DatabaseConnection
      Parameters:
      cryptoName - The crypto to search the prices of.
      date - The date (in YYYY-mm-dd format) to search the prices for.
      Returns:
      A List with all the prices we were able to find for the particular date (could be empty if there were no prices or some other error occurred during the lookup).
